Main-KOR-FTUE-1.chainDescription: Korolev Heavy Industries, the system's industrial powerhouse... and near monopoly. The megacorp came to Fortuna III early to exploit its resources, and sticks around now to make sure its claims don't lapse. Plus, they keep the lights on up here, for a nice profit.  They want you to perform some simple tasks to prove your mettle. Don't disappoint!

Main-KOR-MiningTool-2.description: 'There's a new Mining Tool to make your life easier

Main-KOR-GruntWork-1.description: 'Some journalists have talked their way through all the red tape and will be getting a tour of the old Dig Site soon. Soften up the area for them
Main-KOR-GruntWork-1.chainDescription: Now that you're part of the Korolev family, it's time to put some real work in. Korolev would send down its own teams to retrieve resources, but the planet's status as 'Extremely Hazardous to Life' makes that slightly illegal.  Plus, what kind of person would be crazy enough to go down there, anyway?

Main-KOR-Veltecite-1.chainDescription: Veltecite fuels Prospect Station's power generators, foundries, engines, and is its main export. The few mineral deposits exposed to the surface can generally be found near water, but tracking one down can be time consuming, and dangerous.  Wouldn't it be nice to have an easier and faster way to get to it? Fortunately Korolev has a few techs working on just the thing.

Main-KOR-TitanOre-1.description: 'One of our top engineers believes Prospectors are using radios on the surface to affect his dreams. It's absurd
Main-KOR-TitanOre-1.chainDescription: All those ships and stations Korolev is known for? Titan Ore. It's as strong as it is precious, and also notoriously hard to find.   Help Korolev out to gain access to a new Scanner Attachment for it!

Main-KOR-TitanOre-2.chainDescription: All those ships and stations Korolev is known for? Titan Ore. It's as strong as it is precious, and also notoriously hard to find.   Help Korolev out to gain access to a new Scanner Attachment for it!

Main-KOR-FocusCrystals-1.description: 'We have a new Scanner mod in the works
Main-KOR-FocusCrystals-1.chainDescription: Focus Crystals are a staple in many new electronics, particularly those built in the Fortuna system.  It would be nice if some of those electronics could help with locating them, and with the right materials the techs at Korolev might have just the thing.

Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-1.description: 'A civy retrieval team operating in Crescent Falls brought back the remains of an old miner. That wouldn't normally concern us
Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-1.chainDescription: Stable Letium? It's an important discovery; the compound has so far only been collected as a volatile, quickly decaying gas, and it's not exactly safe to handle.  What little has been collected so far revolutionized Veltecite refining, having a stable source of both would be massive... for Korolev's profits. Definitely worth investigating!

Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-2.description: 'The Federal Authority is upgrading some of its arsenal
Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-2.chainDescription: Stable Letium? Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-5.description: Our team needs more time, but they've prepared a research package for us. It's too much data to send with their equipment, so you'll need to find an Uplink station; your credentials should get us the data they've stored in the surface network.

Main-KOR-FirstExtraWork-1.description: 'Creatures from the Jungle are still bleeding into nearby sites. Thin their numbers. '
Main-KOR-FirstExtraWork-1.chainDescription: Those science people may be busy trying to understand what it is they just discovered, but there's always more work a resourceful prospector like you can do to keep Korolov on top.

Main-KOR-FirstExtraWork-2.description: 'A group of delegates from a trading partner will be visiting us soon
Main-KOR-FirstExtraWork-2.chainDescription: Those science people may be busy trying to understand what it is they just discovered, but there's always more work a resourceful prospector like you can do to keep Korolov on top.

Main-KOR-FirstExtraWork-3.description: 'Our small arms team is working on iterations to new SMG type weapons and could do with more real world data. Give them a good show. '
Main-KOR-FirstExtraWork-3.chainDescription: Those science people may be busy trying to understand what it is they just discovered, but there's always more work a resourceful prospector like you can do to keep Korolov on top.

Main-KOR-FirstExtraWork-4.description: 'One of our agents operating in Bright Sands needs to replace their equipment. Stash these items at the Base Camp for them. '
Main-KOR-FirstExtraWork-4.chainDescription: Those science people may be busy trying to understand what it is they just discovered, but there's always more work a resourceful prospector like you can do to keep Korolov on top.

Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-1.description: 'Our researchers on the station have been analyzing the data you retrieved
Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-1.chainDescription: A lot of questions remain about how to stabilize Letium for safe and easy exploitation; with what's already been recovered and studied, Letium could be used not just to refine Veltecite, but trigger all sorts of other reactions in more common materials.  Help Korolev with what they need and their discoveries might even surpass the brains at Osiris!

Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-2.description: 'It seems some creatures have higher concentrations of Letium than others... My people want some very specific samples now: head to the abandoned Dig Site mine in Bright Sands and hunt down what you can. '
Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-2.chainDescription: A lot of questions remain about how to stabilize Letium for safe and easy exploitation; with what's already been recovered and studied, Letium could be used not just to refine Veltecite, but trigger all sorts of other reactions in more common materials. Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-5.description: 'Our team made it back home! It will be a while before they can get back to work... why not take some time and let everyone Korolev is still king of the hill?'

Main-KOR-CraftingBackpack-1.description: 'The synthetics team is close to a breakthrough on a lighter and more durable fabric
Main-KOR-CraftingBackpack-1.chainDescription: Few tools are more important to a prospector than a good backpack, and the prize for helping Korolev with a few extra tasks might even be described as 'Epic'.

Main-KOR-CraftingBackpack-2.description: 'Excellent... now we just need enough raw materials for a sample run. Getting these shouldn't be an issue for you
Main-KOR-CraftingBackpack-2.chainDescription: Few tools are more important to a prospector than a good backpack, and the prize for helping Korolev with a few extra tasks might even be described as 'Epic'.

Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-1.description: 'Extracting Letium from the surface will require heavy machinery. Heavy
Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-1.chainDescription: Time to build a machine capable of safely (well, relatively) extracting and processing Letium from the surface. Fortunately Korolev used to operate Mobile Mining Platforms, giant laser drills that would float through the peaceful skies of Fortuna III in search of mineral veins to exploit.  The days those things could be safely operated are long gone, but they're just the thing we need now to mine for Letium, with some assistance on the ground.

Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-2.description: 'Something different this time... We need efficiency data on Shotgun style weapons to help improve our own. This shouldn't take you long

Main-KOR-KillCrusher-1.description: 'One of our researchers is concerned that Crushers are an unstoppable force that could easily wreck our mining platforms. I'm sure you can prove them wrong!'
Main-KOR-KillCrusher-1.chainDescription: Crushers aren't known for their curiosity, or really anything other than very efficiently crushing things, which on the off chance they pay a visit to a Laser Drill, it's best we all know you're up to the task of taking one down.  Good hunting, Prospector!

Main-KOR-TestRun-1.description: 'Finally! Our first Laser Drill is fully operational
Main-KOR-TestRun-1.chainDescription: With the Laser Drill complete, it's up to you to test it out and finally retrieve some Letium for Korolev.  Remember to be careful, that thing will draw a lot of unwanted attention during descent, and it'll take a while to produce results!

Main-ICA-FTUE-1.description: 'Welcome! The ICA is always looking for new Prospectors to work with
Main-ICA-FTUE-1.chainDescription: The Independent Civilian Advisory are all about keeping Prospect Station afloat and everyone in it alive.  Will you step up and help? A talented prospector could benefit from being on their good side...

Main-ICA-GainTrust-1.description: 'Great! We're always in need of basic materials to help maintain this station and all its thousands of parts. Speaking of which... '
Main-ICA-GainTrust-1.chainDescription: The Independent Civilian Advisory are all about keeping Prospect Station afloat and everyone in it alive.  Will you step up and help? A talented prospector could benefit from being on their good side...

Main-ICA-GainTrust-2.chainDescription: The Independent Civilian Advisory are all about keeping Prospect Station afloat and everyone in it alive.  Will you step up and help? A talented prospector could benefit from being on their good side...

Main-ICA-GainTrust-3.description: 'Some of our air filters are starting to show wear; get me these parts so we can fix them up before they fail. '
Main-ICA-GainTrust-3.chainDescription: The Independent Civilian Advisory are all about keeping Prospect Station afloat and everyone in it alive.  Will you step up and help? A talented prospector could benefit from being on their good side...

Main-ICA-GainTrust-4.description: 'A lot of our crafts use Azure Tree Bark
Main-ICA-GainTrust-4.chainDescription: The Independent Civilian Advisory are all about keeping Prospect Station afloat and everyone in it alive.  Will you step up and help? A talented prospector could benefit from being on their good side...

Main-ICA-AudioDecoys-1.description: 'As you know the ICA likes to tinker and create its own tools
Main-ICA-AudioDecoys-1.chainDescription: An energetic engineer wants to develop a new kind of grenade, something particularly useful for anyone adventuring on the planet's surface.  A decoy of some kind, to throw off rivals and bait hostile creatures, might be just the thing!

Main-ICA-AudioDecoys-2.description: 'Very good! We needed those for some live testing on the ground
Main-ICA-AudioDecoys-2.chainDescription: An energetic engineer wants to develop a new kind of grenade, something particularly useful for anyone adventuring on the planet's surface.  A decoy of some kind, to throw off rivals and bait hostile creatures, might be just the thing!

Main-ICA-AudioDecoys-3.description: 'The project's head engineer insists on building some of these new grenades on the planet itself
Main-ICA-AudioDecoys-3.chainDescription: An energetic engineer wants to develop a new kind of grenade, something particularly useful for anyone adventuring on the planet's surface.  A decoy of some kind, to throw off rivals and bait hostile creatures, might be just the thing!

Main-ICA-GruntWork-3.chainDescription: Thousands of people live on Prospect Station without any concept of what it takes to keep the lights on. The ICA needs brave prospectors risking it all to operate on the planet, so they can keep things running in orbit.  There's evidence one such prospector got stranded on the surface, now it's up to you to help track them down. Despite all the violence and rivalry, nobody deserves to be left alone on Fortuna III.

Main-ICA-GruntWork-3.1.description: 'These photographs are... disturbing. Even more so because this creature doesn't resemble any of the beasts we're used to. We need a better look... Korolev likes to place cameras to monitor their old installations

Main-ICA-GasGrenades-1.description: 'There was something that will interest you among all the data you recovered; get these items to the Comms Tower stash and we can begin working on a new kind of grenade. '
Main-ICA-GasGrenades-1.chainDescription: The ICA are developing a new grenade type, equipped with lethal toxic gasses.  Help them get what they need, those things would be great for area denial... or getting rid of anyone holed up in a fortified position.

Main-ICA-GasGrenades-2.description: 'We'll need something 'special' for these; head down and retrieve these items for us
Main-ICA-GasGrenades-2.chainDescription: The ICA are developing a new grenade type, equipped with lethal toxic gasses.  Help them get what they need, those things would be great for area denial... or getting rid of anyone holed up in a fortified position.

Main-ICA-MeteorReactor-1.description: 'Our people have gone through more of the data Tao recovered
Main-ICA-MeteorReactor-1.chainDescription: Prospect Station's power woes may soon be over. You just need to retrieve some very delicate machinery, get some highly radioactive meteor fragments, and help the ICA build a highly experimental power generator.  A prospector's life is definitely never boring.

Main-ICA-MeteorReactor-2.description: 'This sort of research requires equipment we don't have at hand
Main-ICA-MeteorReactor-2.chainDescription: Prospect Station's power woes may soon be over. Main-ICA-MeteorReactor-2.1.description: 'We wanted to send down a team to recover materials directly

You just need to retrieve some very delicate machinery, get some highly radioactive meteor fragments, and help the ICA build a highly experimental power generator. Main-ICA-MeteorReactor-5.description: 'One of the supply crates for our project was left open under the rain
Main-ICA-MeteorReactor-5.chainDescription: Prospect Station's power woes may soon be over. You just need to retrieve some very delicate machinery, get some highly radioactive meteor fragments, and help the ICA build a highly experimental power generator.  A prospector's life is definitely never boring.

Main-ICA-CommunityWork-1.chainDescription: The ICA often receives job commissions and requests for prospectors to carry out, acting as a sort of middleman to access the planet.  Handling these jobs keeps the ICA happy, and they pay well enough, too.

Main-ICA-CommunityWork-2.description: 'Another prospector took a bad beating in Crescent Falls; foam kit failed to deploy fully and left his arm exposed. Not much left of it when the retrieval bot got to him
Main-ICA-CommunityWork-2.chainDescription: The ICA often receives job commissions and requests for prospectors to carry out, acting as a sort of middleman to access the planet.  Handling these jobs keeps the ICA happy, and they pay well enough, too.

Main-ICA-CommunityWork-3.description: 'Fruit from Fortuna III fetches a nice price in the Artery systems
Main-ICA-CommunityWork-3.chainDescription: The ICA often receives job commissions and requests for prospectors to carry out, acting as a sort of middleman to access the planet.  Handling these jobs keeps the ICA happy, and they pay well enough, too.

Main-ICA-OilSearch-1.chainDescription: Things didn't work out with the prototype power generator, but at least it didn't blow up.  The research you gathered hinted at another project, so there's still some hope the ICA can find an alternative power source and get out from under Korolev's thumb.

Main-ICA-OilSearch-2.description: 'This whole ordeal has sapped too many of our funds and resources
Main-ICA-OilSearch-2.chainDescription: Things didn't work out with the prototype power generator, but at least it didn't blow up.  The research you gathered hinted at another project, so there's still some hope the ICA can find an alternative power source and get out from under Korolev's thumb.

Main-ICA-OilSearch-3.description: 'Another location mentioned is around the Skeleton Research area; head there and clear it out. Hrmm
Main-ICA-OilSearch-3.chainDescription: Things didn't work out with the prototype power generator, but at least it didn't blow up.  The research you gathered hinted at another project, so there's still some hope the ICA can find an alternative power source and get out from under Korolev's thumb.

Main-ICA-ExtraWork-1.description: 'I've been sitting on a fairly 'particular' commission from an out of system arms company for some time
Main-ICA-ExtraWork-1.chainDescription: Some more private work has come up, and you're the right Prospector for the job.

Main-ICA-ExtraWork-2.description: 'We have reports of increased creature activity in several locations; go to each and thin out their numbers. '
Main-ICA-ExtraWork-2.chainDescription: Some more private work has come up, and you're the right Prospector for the job.

Main-ICA-ExtraWork-3.description: 'A private researcher has requested we help them acquire certain creature parts; apparently they usually got them from Osiris for free
Main-ICA-ExtraWork-3.chainDescription: Some more private work has come up, and you're the right Prospector for the job.

Main-ICA-OilPump-1.description: 'Our people on the surface analyzed everything at the locations you cleared
Main-ICA-OilPump-1.chainDescription: Marie's research team has only found a tarry liquid reminiscent of crude oil, but it doesn't burn easily. Never mind that actual crude would need more power to get out of orbit and onto the station than it could ever generate...  Someone thought it was worth looking into, though, and the ICA is getting desperate.

Main-ICA-OilPump-2.description: 'While our people look into the 'crude' samples
Main-ICA-OilPump-2.chainDescription: Marie's research team has only found a tarry liquid reminiscent of crude oil, but it doesn't burn easily. Never mind that actual crude would need more power to get out of orbit and onto the station than it could ever generate...  Someone thought it was worth looking into, though, and the ICA is getting desperate.

Main-ICA-OilPump-3.description: 'We finally know that 'NiC' stands for Nanite-infused Crude. Someone figured out a way to trigger a reaction in the nanobots' own batteries and get a small burst of energy from them; not much
Main-ICA-OilPump-3.chainDescription: Marie's research team has only found a tarry liquid reminiscent of crude oil, but it doesn't burn easily. Never mind that actual crude would need more power to get out of orbit and onto the station than it could ever generate... Never mind that actual crude would need more power to get out of orbit and onto the station than it could ever generate...  Someone thought it was worth looking into, though, and the ICA is getting desperate.

Main-ICA-OilPump-6.description: 'Getting these pumps to work isn't as simple as we'd hoped. The pumps need to refine the NiC to eliminate as much crude as possible and concentrate the nanites in one convenient package ready for use
Main-ICA-OilPump-6.chainDescription: Marie's research team has only found a tarry liquid reminiscent of crude oil, but it doesn't burn easily. Never mind that actual crude would need more power to get out of orbit and onto the station than it could ever generate... Main-ICA-OilPump-7.description: 'That Dr. Sullivan is starting to poke around and ask questions
Main-ICA-OilPump-7.chainDescription: Marie's research team has only found a tarry liquid reminiscent of crude oil, but it doesn't burn easily. Never mind that actual crude would need more power to get out of orbit and onto the station than it could ever generate...  Someone thought it was worth looking into, though, and the ICA is getting desperate.

Main-ICA-OilPump-8.description: 'You're back just in time; the tech guys have a new list of things they need to finalize NiC refiner and install them in the pumps. After that it will just be a matter of calling them down in the right spot... '
Main-ICA-OilPump-8.chainDescription: Marie's research team has only found a tarry liquid reminiscent of crude oil, but it doesn't burn easily. Never mind that actual crude would need more power to get out of orbit and onto the station than it could ever generate... Main-ICA-OilScanModule-1.chainDescription: You may be able to stumble upon a good oil well by chance, but the ICA can't depend on just dumb luck alone if they want this project to succeed.   A new mod for your Scanner will ensure you always know where to call down Oil Pumps.

Main-ICA-OilScanModule-2.chainDescription: You may be able to stumble upon a good oil well by chance, but the ICA can't depend on just dumb luck alone if they want this project to succeed.   A new mod for your Scanner will ensure you always know where to call down Oil Pumps.

Main-ICA-TestRun-1.description: 'We've gotten reports of Crushers near several of the candidate locations for our oil pump test runs. If one of those beasts wanders into the area while the pumps are running
Main-ICA-TestRun-1.chainDescription: It's finally time to put everything together and drill for oil! If the ICA can get enough concentrated NiC back onto Prospect Station, they'll be able to keep everything powered on their own, free from the exploitative prices Korolev charges.  A lot is riding on this, Prospector.

Main-ICA-TestRun-2.description: 'Time to see if our plans will pay out. Use your new Scanner mod to find wells
Main-ICA-TestRun-2.chainDescription: It's finally time to put everything together and drill for oil! If the ICA can get enough concentrated NiC back onto Prospect Station, they'll be able to keep everything powered on their own, free from the exploitative prices Korolev charges.  A lot is riding on this, Prospector.

Main-Osiris-FTUE-1.description: 'Another Prospector? I guess we could use the muscle. Show me you know how to handle yourself on the surface
Main-Osiris-FTUE-1.chainDescription: Osiris came to Fortuna III to investigate the alien ruins, largely thought to be terraformers by an ancient civilization known as 'Progenitors'.  Helping them may unlock the secrets of the planet's deadly storms and its exotic radiation. Or at least, it'll unlock access to more advanced Osiris gear and medical items.

Main-Osiris-GainTrust-1.description: 'These Abandoned Containers might still have useful supplies in them
Main-Osiris-GainTrust-1.chainDescription: Osiris came to Fortuna III to investigate the alien ruins, largely thought to be terraformers by an ancient civilization known as 'Progenitors'.  Helping them may unlock the secrets of the planet's deadly storms and its exotic radiation. Or at least, it'll unlock access to more advanced Osiris gear and medical items.

Main-Osiris-GainTrust-2.description: 'My team has seen an increase in Strider population in the Bright Sands Swamp; take down some of those creatures and return with the right samples. '
Main-Osiris-GainTrust-2.chainDescription: Osiris came to Fortuna III to investigate the alien ruins, largely thought to be terraformers by an ancient civilization known as 'Progenitors'.  Helping them may unlock the secrets of the planet's deadly storms and its exotic radiation. Or at least, it'll unlock access to more advanced Osiris gear and medical items.

Helping them may unlock the secrets of the planet's deadly storms and its exotic radiation. Or at least, it'll unlock access to more advanced Osiris gear and medical items.

Main-Osiris-GainTrust-4.description: 'We need to run some tests on how the creatures of Fortuna III identify each other
Main-Osiris-GainTrust-4.chainDescription: Osiris came to Fortuna III to investigate the alien ruins, largely thought to be terraformers by an ancient civilization known as 'Progenitors'.  Helping them may unlock the secrets of the planet's deadly storms and its exotic radiation. Or at least, it'll unlock access to more advanced Osiris gear and medical items.

Main-Osiris-GruntWork-1.description: 'You've proven to be more capable than the average prospector
Main-Osiris-GruntWork-1.chainDescription: You've met up to Sullivan's standards, a feat few manage. Now that you've proven yourself capable, he might send you to investigate some of the planet's old mysteries.

Main-Osiris-GruntWork-2.description: 'The Lake in Bright Sands is home to a few very valuable endemic creatures
Main-Osiris-GruntWork-2.chainDescription: You've met up to Sullivan's standards, a feat few manage. Now that you've proven yourself capable, he might send you to investigate some of the planet's old mysteries.

locationConditions: East Collection Point Power Up Room

Main-Osiris-GruntWork-3.chainDescription: You've met up to Sullivan's standards, a feat few manage. Now that you've proven yourself capable, he might send you to investigate some of the planet's old mysteries.

Main-Osiris-GruntWork-3.1.description: 'The process that mutates a Strider into a Heavy Strider still isn't fully understood. We need more samples for our research; kill some of the creatures

Main-Osiris-GruntWork-4.description: 'One of our more 'hands-on' researchers forgot how to pack their tool bag
Main-Osiris-GruntWork-4.chainDescription: You've met up to Sullivan's standards, a feat few manage. Now that you've proven yourself capable, he might send you to investigate some of the planet's old mysteries.

Main-Osiris-GruntWork-5.description: 'We sent another prospector for a simple milk run to the Vaccine Labs
Main-Osiris-GruntWork-5.chainDescription: You've met up to Sullivan's standards, a feat few manage. Now that you've proven yourself capable, he might send you to investigate some of the planet's old mysteries.

Main-Osiris-GruntWork-6.description: 'The financial team is struggling to figure out what project to waste money on for next quarter. How do you fit in? Well
Main-Osiris-GruntWork-6.chainDescription: You've met up to Sullivan's standards, a feat few manage. Now that you've proven yourself capable, he might send you to investigate some of the planet's old mysteries.

Main-Osiris-GruntWork-7.chainDescription: You've met up to Sullivan's standards, a feat few manage. Now that you've proven yourself capable, he might send you to investigate some of the planet's old mysteries.

Main-Osiris-GruntWork-8.description: 'I plan on sending down a team to collect more old samples. Make sure they're well supplied
Main-Osiris-GruntWork-8.chainDescription: You've met up to Sullivan's standards, a feat few manage. Now that you've proven yourself capable, he might send you to investigate some of the planet's old mysteries.

Main-Osiris-StrongStims-0.1.description: 'This should interest you: we have a small team researching new
Main-Osiris-StrongStims-0.1.chainDescription: Osiris specialize in medical tech, from surgical robots to powerful medicines and even healing nanites. Many of their advancements are only possible thanks to prospectors like you retrieving samples from the planet.  Get Osiris what they need, and you'll be rewarded with access to new, stronger health stims.

Main-Osiris-StrongStims-1.description: 'The formula is very exact... we need certain chemicals from older Medical Supplies

Main-Osiris-StrongStims-2.description: 'There are a few more items from the surface our team needs

Main-Osiris-CaveRumors-0.1.chainDescription: Now Dr. Sullivan's interest is piqued after you helped uncover forgotten research into the planet's extinct creatures and their unnatural anatomy.   It seems he's realizing that the planet's mysteries won't unravel themselves without some hands-on 'research' from prospectors like you.

Main-Osiris-CaveRumors-1.description: Drop down to Crescent Falls and find our old Processing Plant at Nutrion Farms, Prospector. We need to verify whether any of that old machinery is still in useable condition. And, while you're there, bring back some Fauna and Flora samples.

Main-Osiris-CaveRumors-2.description: 'We've received several reports of rival actors searching the Favela on Crescent Falls for something; we don't know what

Main-Osiris-CaveRumors-3.description: 'I listened through parts of that crashed ship's flight recorder

Main-Osiris-ExplosivesTry-1.description: 'The notebook you brought back was most interesting
Main-Osiris-ExplosivesTry-1.chainDescription: The caverns you found are encased by a crystalline structure, far too strong for any of your weapons to break through. Sullivan believes there's a connection between them and the Progenitor terraforming tech.  Explosives aren't the usual Osiris way, but they're a time-tested cheap way of opening holes in walls.

Main-Osiris-PrototypeLaser-1.description: 'It appears Dr. Fedotov had already conferred with Dr. Farinha about how to break into the Crystal Caverns; it figures the man wouldn't write anything down and make our lives easy. He insists only a high powered laser drill can get through those walls
Main-Osiris-PrototypeLaser-1.chainDescription: Dr. Fedotov wasn't impressed with the attempt at using explosives to break into the Crystal Cavern. His solution: a laser.  At least he agrees with Dr. Sullivan on the importance of getting through the cavern's walls, even if they don't see eye to eye on much else.

Main-Osiris-PrototypeLaser-2.description: 'Progress is slower than I'd hoped. Korolev refuses to share schematics for their decommissioned Veltecite Laser Drill platforms
Main-Osiris-PrototypeLaser-2.chainDescription: Dr. Fedotov wasn't impressed with the attempt at using explosives to break into the Crystal Cavern. His solution: a laser.  At least he agrees with Dr. Sullivan on the importance of getting through the cavern's walls, even if they don't see eye to eye on much else.

Main-Osiris-StormSamples-1.description: 'You've experienced one of the planet's famed Storms already
Main-Osiris-StormSamples-1.chainDescription: Fortuna III's storms are infamous, being one of the first signs of the lethal events that would force the evacuation of the planet.  The creatures of Fortuna III, however, seem energized by them, literally. Help Osiris understand what's going on.

Main-Osiris-StormSamples-2.chainDescription: Fortuna III's storms are infamous, being one of the first signs of the lethal events that would force the evacuation of the planet.  The creatures of Fortuna III, however, seem energized by them, literally. Help Osiris understand what's going on.

Main-Osiris-StormSamples-3.description: 'We're interested in running more tests on Storm-affected samples
Main-Osiris-StormSamples-3.chainDescription: Fortuna III's storms are infamous, being one of the first signs of the lethal events that would force the evacuation of the planet.  The creatures of Fortuna III, however, seem energized by them, literally. Help Osiris understand what's going on.

Main-Osiris-SideWork1-1.inGameName: The Needs of the One Part 1
Main-Osiris-SideWork1-1.description: 'Dr. Fedotov is... a character. He's requested an office with a garden and refuses to speak with anyone on his team until he gets it. Get me these items so we can just get this over with. '
Main-Osiris-SideWork1-1.chainDescription: Getting Dr. Fedotov out of cryo may have been more trouble than its worth. After a (justified) tirade against Dr. Sullivan for not rescuing him sooner, he's refusing to speak to anyone in person until a series of curious demands are met.  It'll be best to keep him content, if only for his new assistant's sake.

Main-Osiris-SideWork1-2.inGameName: The Needs of the One Part 2
Main-Osiris-SideWork1-2.chainDescription: Getting Dr. Fedotov out of cryo may have been more trouble than its worth. After a (justified) tirade against Dr. Sullivan for not rescuing him sooner, he's refusing to speak to anyone in person until a series of curious demands are met.  It'll be best to keep him content, if only for his new assistant's sake.

Main-Osiris-SideWork1-3.inGameName: The Needs of the One Part 3
Main-Osiris-SideWork1-3.chainDescription: Getting Dr. Fedotov out of cryo may have been more trouble than its worth. After a (justified) tirade against Dr. Sullivan for not rescuing him sooner, he's refusing to speak to anyone in person until a series of curious demands are met.  It'll be best to keep him content, if only for his new assistant's sake.

Main-Osiris-SideWork1-4.inGameName: The Needs of the One Part 4
Main-Osiris-SideWork1-4.description: 'The good Dr. Fedotov is trying my patience with his absurd requests. You're to take down some of your rival Prospectors... and bring back some Dustblooms. I swear
Main-Osiris-SideWork1-4.chainDescription: Getting Dr. Fedotov out of cryo may have been more trouble than its worth. After a (justified) tirade against Dr. Sullivan for not rescuing him sooner, he's refusing to speak to anyone in person until a series of curious demands are met.  It'll be best to keep him content, if only for his new assistant's sake.

Main-Osiris-CrystalSamples-1.description: 'It's time to start testing our new anti-crystal laser
Main-Osiris-CrystalSamples-1.chainDescription: The new laser cannon is a beast more suited as a military weapon than a mining tool, and requires far more power than any laser drill on Prospect Station has access to.  Make sure Osiris gets what it needs to get it working.

Main-Osiris-CrystalSamples-2.chainDescription: The new laser cannon is a beast more suited as a military weapon than a mining tool, and requires far more power than any laser drill on Prospect Station has access to.  Make sure Osiris gets what it needs to get it working.

Main-Osiris-CrystalSamples-3.description: 'Our laser cannon has proven to be... 'hazardous' to test on the station. We've developed a small portable version for further tests. Clear out the Pinnacle labs of hostile fauna and stash some Pure Focus Crystals there; a field research team will be down for further tests once you're done. '
Main-Osiris-CrystalSamples-3.chainDescription: The new laser cannon is a beast more suited as a military weapon than a mining tool, and requires far more power than any laser drill on Prospect Station has access to.  Make sure Osiris gets what it needs to get it working.

Main-Osiris-StrongMedkits-1.description: 'We're continuing to research better ways to keep prospectors like you alive on the planet
Main-Osiris-StrongMedkits-1.chainDescription: The advancements in medical technology continue, partly thanks the samples you've collected.  Now, while emergency medical procedures aren't something you should be practicing on the surface of an alien planet, assisting Osiris in developing improved med kits may improve the chances of a good outcome when you're forced to.

Main-Osiris-StrongMedkits-2.description: 'The chemical properties of Fortuna III's flora and fauna is truly fascinating... one would expect it to be completely foreign to our own
Main-Osiris-StrongMedkits-2.chainDescription: The advancements in medical technology continue, partly thanks the samples you've collected.  Now, while emergency medical procedures aren't something you should be practicing on the surface of an alien planet, assisting Osiris in developing improved med kits may improve the chances of a good outcome when you're forced to.

Main-Osiris-StrongMedkits-3.description: 'We have reason to believe Korolev has a mole and is trying to steal our work on these Medkits and put them to market before we do; I've seeded rumors to different members of my team
Main-Osiris-StrongMedkits-3.chainDescription: The advancements in medical technology continue, partly thanks the samples you've collected.  Now, while emergency medical procedures aren't something you should be practicing on the surface of an alien planet, assisting Osiris in developing improved med kits may improve the chances of a good outcome when you're forced to.

Main-Osiris-CraftFuel-1.inGameName: Building a better Death Ray Part 1
Main-Osiris-CraftFuel-1.description: 'Our recent tests have made it quite apparent our anti-crystal laser cannot be safely operated in atmosphere
Main-Osiris-CraftFuel-1.chainDescription: The initial plan to repurpose one of Korolev's old veltecite mobile drilling platforms fell through, and not just because of Korolev's uncooperative behavior.   The laser cannon will have to be operated from space; help Osiris fix up an old survey satellite in order to have the cannon fire from low orbit.

Main-Osiris-CraftFuel-2.inGameName: Building a better Death Ray Part 2
Main-Osiris-CraftFuel-2.chainDescription: The initial plan to repurpose one of Korolev's old veltecite mobile drilling platforms fell through, and not just because of Korolev's uncooperative behavior.   The laser cannon will have to be operated from space; help Osiris fix up an old survey satellite in order to have the cannon fire from low orbit.

Main-Osiris-UplinkHack-1.description: 'It's almost time to get our satellite into orbit. Hack into the surface Uplink network
Main-Osiris-UplinkHack-1.chainDescription: Getting what is basically a an orbital beam cannon into an orbit around Fortuna III isn't as easy as it first seemed.  Help Osiris ensure their new satellite gets operational, and make sure the other factions don't catch wind about what's going on; whatever is past those cavern walls, only Osiris could fully understand.

Main-Osiris-UplinkHack-2.description: 'It's been brought to my attention that orbital weapons are banned in this system
Main-Osiris-UplinkHack-2.chainDescription: Getting what is basically a an orbital beam cannon into an orbit around Fortuna III isn't as easy as it first seemed.  Help Osiris ensure their new satellite gets operational, and make sure the other factions don't catch wind about what's going on; whatever is past those cavern walls, only Osiris could fully understand.

Main-Osiris-UplinkHack-3.description: 'It appears that tricking the network to accept our satellite as legitimate is a more involved process than I had been lead to believe. A team of specialists will be heading to the surface soon to get the job done
Main-Osiris-UplinkHack-3.chainDescription: Getting what is basically a an orbital beam cannon into an orbit around Fortuna III isn't as easy as it first seemed.  Help Osiris ensure their new satellite gets operational, and make sure the other factions don't catch wind about what's going on; whatever is past those cavern walls, only Osiris could fully understand.

Main-Osiris-CombatStims-1.description: 'Research into Fortuna III's biosphere has so much potential
Main-Osiris-CombatStims-1.chainDescription: Stims aren't recommended for more than life or death emergencies, sometimes leading to more complications then the initial injury or simply not acting fast enough to make a difference.  Osiris thinks it can fix at least one of those problems, if you can help them find the ingredients they need.

Main-Osiris-CombatStims-2.chainDescription: Stims aren't recommended for more than life or death emergencies, sometimes leading to more complications then the initial injury or simply not acting fast enough to make a difference.  Osiris thinks it can fix at least one of those problems, if you can help them find the ingredients they need.

Main-Osiris-CombatStims-3.description: 'Initial trials have proven to be... disappointing. The near-immediate healing process works flawlessly
Main-Osiris-CombatStims-3.chainDescription: Stims aren't recommended for more than life or death emergencies, sometimes leading to more complications then the initial injury or simply not acting fast enough to make a difference.  Osiris thinks it can fix at least one of those problems, if you can help them find the ingredients they need.

Main-Osiris-SatelliteRepairs-1.description: 'Target calibration on our satellite is off; it was within acceptable parameters in our original designs
Main-Osiris-SatelliteRepairs-1.chainDescription: Warm up tests on the Orbital Cannon have uncovered a serious accuracy issue that needs to be resolved ASAP. The problem is, the satellite is already in orbit, and recalling it would raise questions about its true purpose.  You'll need to help Osiris develop a hotfix.

Main-Osiris-SatelliteRepairs-2.description: 'The ICA has been following up on all our recent 'weapons' research on station and gotten curious about the lack of tangible results. Head to the surface and perform some 'tests' with Osiris gear on some unwilling participants
Main-Osiris-SatelliteRepairs-2.chainDescription: Warm up tests on the Orbital Cannon have uncovered a serious accuracy issue that needs to be resolved ASAP. The problem is, the satellite is already in orbit, and recalling it would raise questions about its true purpose.  You'll need to help Osiris develop a hotfix.

Main-Osiris-SatelliteRepairs-3.description: 'The worst outcome is of course the most likely. The satellite will need to be modified while in orbit and part of the outer casing replaced. Retrieve these materials
Main-Osiris-SatelliteRepairs-3.chainDescription: Warm up tests on the Orbital Cannon have uncovered a serious accuracy issue that needs to be resolved ASAP. The problem is, the satellite is already in orbit, and recalling it would raise questions about its true purpose.  You'll need to help Osiris develop a hotfix.

Main-Osiris-SatelliteRepairs-4.description: 'The satellite's orbit is too low for our technicians to safely operate at due to all the TEF radiation from the planet. We'll need to construct specialized EVA suits; a mesh made from crusher hide to envelop them might be enough to keep our people safe. For a short while
Main-Osiris-SatelliteRepairs-4.chainDescription: Warm up tests on the Orbital Cannon have uncovered a serious accuracy issue that needs to be resolved ASAP. The problem is, the satellite is already in orbit, and recalling it would raise questions about its true purpose.  You'll need to help Osiris develop a hotfix.

Main-Osiris-TestRun-1.description: 'It's time! Head to the Crystal Caverns' entrance and place the Orbital Cannon Beacon; once its finally served its purpose
Main-Osiris-TestRun-1.chainDescription: Everything is ready to fire up that Orbital Cannon! You'll need to place a beacon at the right location for the satellite to lock on to the cavern entrance, then hope those calibrations fixes worked out.  Once the cavern opens up, be quick to get in and explore them; anything you find inside may be of immense importance for Osiris.

Main-ICA-ExtraWork2-1.chainDescription: You're starting to really make a name for yourself in the community, Prospector. They're beginning to trust you more and, with that, ask for your help more.

Main-ICA-ExtraWork2-2.description: 'I've been stumped trying to find a birthday gift for one of ICA's oldest members
Main-ICA-ExtraWork2-2.chainDescription: You're starting to really make a name for yourself in the community, Prospector. They're beginning to trust you more and, with that, ask for your help more.

Main-ICA-ExtraWork2-3.description: 'I appreciate you doing that for me... but I have one more thing to ask. If you could get me some rattler skins and bone plates
Main-ICA-ExtraWork2-3.chainDescription: You're starting to really make a name for yourself in the community, Prospector. They're beginning to trust you more and, with that, ask for your help more.

Main-KOR-Unique-1.chainDescription: Now that you're part of the Korolev family, it's time to put some real work in. Korolev would send down its own teams to retrieve resources, but the planet's status as 'Extremely Hazardous to Life' makes that slightly illegal.  Plus, what kind of person would be crazy enough to go down there, anyway?

Main-KOR-Unique-2.description: 'Prospector! We believe we've located where our Letium-covered friend was working
Main-KOR-Unique-2.chainDescription: Stable Letium? It's an important discovery; the compound has so far only been collected as a volatile, quickly decaying gas, and it's not exactly safe to handle.  What little has been collected so far revolutionized Veltecite refining, having a stable source of both would be massive... for Korolev's profits. Definitely worth investigating!

Main-KOR-Unique-3.description: 'Our new scientist friend believes Osiris was already researching the presence of Letium in various creatures. Head to their main lab on Bright Sands and bring back whatever samples they were studying. '
Main-KOR-Unique-3.chainDescription: A lot of questions remain about how to stabilize Letium for safe and easy exploitation; with what's already been recovered and studied, Letium could be used not just to refine Veltecite, but trigger all sorts of other reactions in more common materials.  Help Korolev with what they need and their discoveries might even surpass the brains at Osiris!

Main-KOR-Unique-4.description: 'There's no point in reinventing the wheel! Head out to the crashed Laser Drill on Bright Sands
Main-KOR-Unique-4.chainDescription: Time to build a machine capable of safely (well, relatively) extracting and processing Letium from the surface. Fortunately Korolev used to operate Mobile Mining Platforms, giant laser drills that would float through the peaceful skies of Fortuna III in search of mineral veins to exploit.  The days those things could be safely operated are long gone, but they're just the thing we need now to mine for Letium, with some assistance on the ground.

Main-ICA-Unique-1.chainDescription: Thousands of people live on Prospect Station without any concept of what it takes to keep the lights on. The ICA needs brave prospectors risking it all to operate on the planet, so they can keep things running in orbit.  There's evidence one such prospector got stranded on the surface, now it's up to you to help track them down. Despite all the violence and rivalry, nobody deserves to be left alone on Fortuna III.

Main-ICA-Unique-2.description: 'I'm not surprised you didn't find anyone... I think I know who left the SOS there
Main-ICA-Unique-2.chainDescription: Thousands of people live on Prospect Station without any concept of what it takes to keep the lights on. Main-ICA-Unique-3.description: 'We found a number of candidate locations Tao could have visited

Main-ICA-Unique-6.description: 'This stuff is actual crude oil... mixed with billions upon billions of dead nanobots. It must have been used by the Progenitors to help terraform the planet! My predecessors from before the storms set up some pumps to collect the stuff; head to them and retrieve what you can. '

Main-Osiris-Unique-1.description: 'I've been looking through old notes from before the evacuations and came upon something... interesting. There were some unique bone samples found at the Archaeology site
Main-Osiris-Unique-1.chainDescription: You've met up to Sullivan's standards, a feat few manage. Now that you've proven yourself capable, he might send you to investigate some of the planet's old mysteries.

Main-Osiris-Unique-2.description: 'Remember those Old Bones you brought back earlier? There's a mystery there
Main-Osiris-Unique-2.chainDescription: You've met up to Sullivan's standards, a feat few manage. Now that you've proven yourself capable, he might send you to investigate some of the planet's old mysteries.

Main-Osiris-Unique-3.description: 'I've been looking into everyone that worked at the Extinct Creatures lab

Main-Osiris-Unique-4.description: 'It'll take some time to run tests on these. In the meantime

Main-Osiris-Unique-5.description: 'That crystal structure enveloping the caverns is far more resistant than I thought imaginable
Main-Osiris-Unique-5.chainDescription: The caverns you found are encased by a crystalline structure, far too strong for any of your weapons to break through. Sullivan believes there's a connection between them and the Progenitor terraforming tech.  Explosives aren't the usual Osiris way, but they're a time-tested cheap way of opening holes in walls.

Main-KOR-Caverns-1.description: 'Your raids of old Osiris data unearthed something I had forgotten about

Main-KOR-Caverns-3.description: 'There is a lot to go through here: accounts of illnesses

Main-KOR-Caverns-4.description: 'Evidently the word has spread quickly that Tharis Island is again safe to step on

Main-KOR-Caverns-5.description: 'Another lead has come up from the logbook you recovered; one of the team's geologists was collecting a 'strange ore'. I can't tell what that means

Main-KOR-Caverns-7.description: 'Our researchers want more of these exotic samples

Main-KOR-Caverns-10.description: 'Nothing is working out! Nothing you brought back is natural

Main-KOR-Caverns-11.description: 'I had thought the reports of sickness were fake

Main-KOR-Caverns-12.description: 'We've mapped out the areas my men can access safely

Main-KOR-Caverns-13.description: 'The records you brought back... they paint a bad picture. One of Gregor's trusted men went missing down there carrying the only true records of the operation

Main-ICA-Caverns-1.description: 'There is a special task I would like you to carry out for us

Main-ICA-Caverns-2.description: 'Killed... with guns and blades. By other people. I don't know how to convey this to the families

Main-ICA-Caverns-3.description: 'The diary you brought back to us only leaves me with more questions. Whoever attacked the site went after Osiris' first

Main-ICA-Caverns-3.1.description: 'There are rumors spreading around about this island

Main-ICA-Caverns-4.description: 'I've done some digging around old files

Main-ICA-Caverns-6.description: 'We only managed to recover a few fragments of the videolog you recovered

Main-ICA-Caverns-7.description: 'I've been reviewing more of the recordings you brought back to us

Main-ICA-Caverns-8.description: 'That door? It's not made of any alloy we've seen used before. There are mentions of some sort of new metal Osiris was studying

Main-ICA-Caverns-9.description: 'Whatever this stuff you got us is

Main-ICA-Caverns-10.description: 'We've determined only that we don't know what this stuff is. High concentration of iron

Main-ICA-Caverns-11.description: 'I think it's time we send a clearer message; the corps might not care if the cannon fodder they send down come back encased in foam each time

Main-ICA-Caverns-12.description: 'The Council expressed 'strong concerns' over my proposed plan

Main-ICA-Caverns-13.description: 'We're looking into all this... both Korolev and Osiris found these rare materials in the caverns

Main-ICA-Caverns-13.1.description: 'If you find some more NiC Oil Cannisters or Old Currency

Main-Osiris-Caverns-1.description: 'You're ready. I have some recon work for you

Main-Osiris-Caverns-2.description: 'I need more information before I act; get into the Korolev Island HQ and retrieve whatever information that might shed some light on what happened. If Korolev truly is responsible for what happened

Main-Osiris-Caverns-3.description: 'Unexpected. Both our people and Korolev's were attacked by a third party

Main-Osiris-Caverns-4.1.description: 'One of my researchers working in the Crescent Falls area has some theories on those Spine Briar plants

Main-Osiris-Caverns-5.description: 'The results came back on the Crushers irradiated by Tharis: inconclusive; none of the creatures you dispatched seemed to be over a decade old

Main-Osiris-Caverns-7.description: 'These 'Teratomorphic Crystals' are proving to be an interesting puzzle. There's nothing organic or 'living' about them

Main-Osiris-Caverns-8.description: 'It appears the cultists were fixated on the same rare ore that kept Korolev and our own Osiris people

Main-Osiris-Caverns-9.description: 'Our experiments with Tharis Iron proved very productive; concentrated blasts of TEF radiation caused the samples to react by warping into different shapes. Some

Main-Osiris-Caverns-10.description: 'It's clear that the importance of these caverns can't be overstated; Korolev stumbled upon a Progenitor terraforming artifact and they simply decided to mine around it

Main-Osiris-Caverns-11.description: 'Korolev had people block off the deepest caverns

Main-Osiris-Caverns-12.description: 'Fascinating... The installation on Tharis Island may not have been part of the Progenitor terraformer network

Main-Osiris-Caverns-14.description: 'I think it's time to move forward with our work on the Abyss Forge. Use the 'recipe' you found earlier

Main-KOR-EarlyMap2-1.description: Prospector. We've caught some of our Miners, loaded with illegally mined Veltecite, on their way back from an area called Crescent Falls. Korolev used to have some mining operations there, which had to be abandoned. Drop down there and see if its safe for us again!
Main-KOR-EarlyMap2-1.chainDescription: Korolev found out that Crescent Falls, a once crucial Base of Operations for their Mining Parties, might have just finally been clearing up from all that Radiation again. You should head down there and see what's left. But make sure to gear up.

Main-KOR-EarlyMap2-2.description: Wow. Some minor radiation, but nothing your suit can't handle... I think. Go back down there and find Greens Prospect, used to be the heart of our operations on Crescent Falls.
Main-KOR-EarlyMap2-2.chainDescription: Korolev found out that Crescent Falls, a once crucial Base of Operations for their Mining Parties, might have just finally been clearing up from all that Radiation again. You should head down there and see what's left. But make sure to gear up.

Main-KOR-EarlyMap2-3.description: Excellent! Haha, who would have thought that after all this time we might be able to resume operations on Crescent Falls! If you're up to the challenge, go see if the old Nutrion Farms Warehouse is still intact. And bring us back some Brittle Titan Ore, should be a bit more common on Crescent Falls.
Main-KOR-EarlyMap2-3.chainDescription: Korolev found out that Crescent Falls, a once crucial Base of Operations for their Mining Parties, might have just finally been clearing up from all that Radiation again. You should head down there and see what's left. But make sure to gear up.

Main-KOR-EarlyMap2-4.description: The Nutrion Farms on Crescent Falls used to produce a majority of the Calories we needed to maintain our Workforce back in the day using some strange-tasting Nutritional Bars. I forgot their Name. But see if you can find any of those!
Main-KOR-EarlyMap2-4.chainDescription: Korolev found out that Crescent Falls, a once crucial Base of Operations for their Mining Parties, might have just finally been clearing up from all that Radiation again. You should head down there and see what's left. But make sure to gear up.

Main-Osiris-EarlyMap2-1.description: Ah, Prospector! Grab some decent Gear and drop down to Crescent Falls, an Area that used to be of great Interest to our Research and that now might be accessible again, if the bragging from Korolev numbskulls is to be trusted. Go check!
Main-Osiris-EarlyMap2-1.chainDescription: Osiris has been studying both the Fauna and Flora on Crescent Falls for years before the Storm made the Area uninhabitable. According to recent reports, that beautiful ecosystem might slowly become accessible again. Help Osiris reclaim their Research Facilities.

Main-Osiris-EarlyMap2-2.description: Hmm... yes. Radiation Levels would be too high for me to spend my Weekend down there, but we have you for that. We used to research the Flora on Crescent Falls quite extensively, see if you can find some of the Pale Ivy Blossoms we used in Material Science and Medicine Synthesis back then!
Main-Osiris-EarlyMap2-2.chainDescription: Osiris has been studying both the Fauna and Flora on Crescent Falls for years before the Storm made the Area uninhabitable. According to recent reports, that beautiful ecosystem might slowly become accessible again. Help Osiris reclaim their Research Facilities.

Main-Osiris-EarlyMap2-3.description: Hah. Can't wait to see Vadim's face once we start manufacturing the best Stims on Prospect Station again! Thank you. Now, last but not least, see if you can clear the Area around the big Skeleton of hostile Fauna so we can resurrect our old Observation Site there!
Main-Osiris-EarlyMap2-3.chainDescription: Osiris has been studying both the Fauna and Flora on Crescent Falls for years before the Storm made the Area uninhabitable. According to recent reports, that beautiful ecosystem might slowly become accessible again. Help Osiris reclaim their Research Facilities.

Main-Osiris-Howler-1.chainDescription: A new predator stalks Fortuna III, preying on rookie and veteran prospectors alike. The emergence of this new creature may be a natural occurrence, or it may indicate impending changes... and on Fortuna III, change is seldom good.  Support Osiris in researching this new species: track down their nests, study their behavior, and acquire viable samples, by any means possible.

Main-Osiris-Howler-2.description: 'Definitely not the outcome I expected from your investigations. It appears you may have discovered a new form of creature
Main-Osiris-Howler-2.chainDescription: A new predator stalks Fortuna III, preying on rookie and veteran prospectors alike. Main-Osiris-Howler-3.description: 'One of my assistants raised a concerning possibility about our mysterious new friend. During the early stages of prospecting a creature known as 'Howler' surfaced and effectively halted all operations on the planet. Despite their dominance

Main-Badum-FinalQuestline1-1-FTUE.description: 'You want more work? I might have some tasks you can help with
Main-Badum-FinalQuestline1-1-FTUE.chainDescription: Badum's got some tough work lined up for you, but first he wants you to earn the factions' favor to be sure you're capable. He's not just some guy running a bar, after all, he keeps the peace between factions, and between prospectors.  Plus he also runs the biggest smuggling operation on Prospect Station. It's smart to have a guy like him in your corner.

Main-Badum-FinalQuestline1-2.description: 'Good job keeping the factions happy... they may have their own agendas

Main-Badum-FinalQuestline1-4.description: 'Osiris aren't the only crew interested in all this crazy planet and storm stuff. Plenty of buyers in the Artery

Main-Badum-FinalQuestline1-5.description: 'Been talking with some of the faction guys

Main-Badum-FinalQuestline1-6.description: 'I've got my eyes on some of that new stuff that's been showing up on the station lately. The factions are being really tight fisted about it

Main-Osiris-Caverns-0.2-Unlock.description: Ah, our most efficient Prospector. Good. I think you should be able to handle exploring Tharis now. Bring us the parts we need to improve your drop pod so you don't go up in flames as you drop to the Island.
